content: So, I think all we can really say is over the long-term, we're again -- we're not retaining cash, we're going to continue our approach here and as it relates to repurchases to kind of dovetail on to your second question here, that is something that we look at not only by seeing where our liquidity is at anytime, but it is a little bit opportunistic in terms of where the market is, that's part of it.
